examples: Standards of morality seem to be dropping.
Los estándares de moralidad parecen estar cayendo.
There is a continuing debate on the morality of abortion.
Hay un debate continuo sobre la moralidad del aborto.
as a judge she had to pass judgment based on the law and not on her personal morality.
como juez tenía que emitir un juicio basado en la ley y no en su moralidad personal.
